sentences.sentence: When you prearrange your funeral, you can pick your own flowers and music.
sentences.translation: 当你预先准备自己的葬礼时，你就能够选择自己喜欢的鲜花和音乐。

sentences.sentence: I had it to prearrange in mine diary several months!
sentences.translation: 我有它预定了在我的日志里几个月！

sentences.sentence: Washes and the clean toy should in prearrange in the timetable.
sentences.translation: 洗涤和清洗玩具应该在预定时间表内。
